channel.title: Music – 이기찬외 다수

item.title: 이기찬외 다수 - 고요한 밤 거룩한 밤 The First Noel
item.description:
작곡: F.X.Gruber / 작사: J.Mohr
KY: 7459

Oh merry Christmas
baby oh my love
Silent night
holy night
All is calm
all is bright
Round you virgin
mother and child
Holy infant
so tender and mild
Sleep in
heavenly peace
Sleep in
heavenly peace-
Silent night
oh holy night
All is calm
all is bright
Round you virgin
mother and child
Holy holy infant
so tender-
Sleep in
heavenly peace
Sleep in
heavenly peace-
The first Noel
the angel did say
Was to certain
poor shepards
In fields as they lay
in fields where they
Lay a keeping
their sheep
On a cold winter’s
night that was so deep
Noel Noel Noel Noel
born is the king
Of Israel
Noel Noel Noel Noel
Born is the king
of Israel-
